sections.title: Veiled Illusionist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Veiled Illusionist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Veiled Illusionist)
sections.description: Veiled illusionists gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Veil Pool (Sp) (Veiled Illusionist)
sections.description: A magical energy pool used to fuel disguise abilities, granting disguise self effects with scaling sensory enhancements and DC based on remaining pool points.

sections.title: Goddess’s Veils (Veiled Illusionist)
sections.description: Six racial disguise forms that provide enhanced disguise bonuses and unique magical abilities when assumed using the veil pool.

sections.title: Quick Veil (Veiled Illusionist)
sections.description: Reduces the action required to assume or alter disguises from standard action to move action at 5th level, then to swift action at 7th level.

sections.title: True Veil (Veiled Illusionist)
sections.description: Imbues disguises with reality by treating them as polymorph effects with shadow descriptor, granting actual physical transformations and abilities.
